text: Yóutài jiàotú zhōng yǒuxiē rén, tāmen cuàngǎi jīngdiǎn yuánwén, ránhòu shuō:“Wǒmen tīngjiàn nǐ [mù shèng] dehuàle, dàn wǒmen bù fúcóng.”“Nǐ zì yán zì tīng ba! Ān lā bù huì ràng nǐ tīngjiàn [tā de yányǔ] de.”“Nǐmen rènzhēn tīng wǒmen suǒ yán, wǒmen yě rènzhēn tīng nǐmen suǒ yán.” Tāmen qūjiě jīngdiǎn, fěibàng shèng jiào. Jiǎrú tāmen shuō:“Wǒmen tīngjiànle, wǒmen fúcóngle” hé “ràng wǒmen lǐjiě ba!” Nà duì tāmen shì zuì hǎo de, shì zuì zhèngquè de. Dàn ān lā yīn tāmen bù xìnyǎng ér qiǎnzé tāmen, suǒyǐ, tāmen chú shǎoshù rén wài dōu bù xìnyǎng.
